Token.Abstract: NSRRequest is a class used internally by NSRRemoteObject to make remote requests, but can also be used directly to construct custom resource paths, etc.
Config used to make the request.
Config used to make the request.
The path to be appended to config's appURL (the base URL of your app).
The path to be appended to config's appURL (the base URL of your app).
The HTTP verb with which to make the request.
The HTTP verb with which to make the request.
The query parameters with which to make the request.
The query parameters with which to make the request.
Request body.
Request body.
Creates and returns an NSRRequest object initialized with httpMethod set to @"GET".

ReturnValue.Abstract: An NSRRequest object initialized with httpMethod set to @"GET".

Token.Abstract: Creates and returns an NSRRequest object initialized with httpMethod set to @"DELETE".

ReturnValue.Abstract: An NSRRequest object initialized with httpMethod set to @"DELETE".

Token.Abstract: Creates and returns an NSRRequest object initialized with httpMethod set to @"POST".

ReturnValue.Abstract: An NSRRequest object initialized with httpMethod set to @"POST".

Token.Abstract: Creates and returns an NSRRequest object initialized with httpMethod set to @"PUT".

ReturnValue.Abstract: An NSRRequest object initialized with httpMethod set to @"PUT".

Token.Abstract: Creates and returns an NSRRequest object initialized with httpMethod set to @"PATCH".

ReturnValue.Abstract: An NSRRequest object initialized with httpMethod set to @"PATCH".

Token.Abstract: Creates and returns an NSRRequest object set to fetch an object with a specified ID.

Parameter.Name: remoteID
Parameter.Abstract: Remote ID of the object you wish to fetch. Will raise an exception if this is nil.

Parameter.Name: class
Parameter.Abstract: Class of the object you wish to fetch. Must be an NSRRemoteObject subclass.

ReturnValue.Abstract: An NSRRequest object set to fetch an object with a specified ID.

Token.Abstract: Creates and returns an NSRRequest object set to fetch all objects of a given class.

Parameter.Name: class
Parameter.Abstract: Class of the object you wish to fetch. Must be an NSRRemoteObject subclass.

ReturnValue.Abstract: An NSRRequest object set to fetch all objects of a given class.

Token.Abstract: Creates and returns an NSRRequest object set to fetch all objects of a given class given a parent object.

Parameter.Name: class
Parameter.Abstract: Class of the object you wish to fetch. Must be an NSRRemoteObject subclass.

Parameter.Name: obj
Parameter.Abstract: Parent object used to prefix the route.

ReturnValue.Abstract: An NSRRequest object set to fetch all objects of a given class given a parent object.

Token.Abstract: Creates and returns an NSRRequest object set to remotely create a given object.

Parameter.Name: obj
Parameter.Abstract: Object you wish to create.

ReturnValue.Abstract: An NSRRequest object set to remotely create a given object.

Token.Abstract: Creates and returns an NSRRequest object set to fetch a given object's remote correspondance.

Parameter.Name: obj
Parameter.Abstract: Object you wish to fetch.

ReturnValue.Abstract: An NSRRequest object set to fetch a given object's remote correspondance.

Token.Abstract: Creates and returns an NSRRequest object set to remotely destroy a given object.

Parameter.Name: obj
Parameter.Abstract: Object you wish to fetch.

ReturnValue.Abstract: An NSRRequest object set to destroy a given object's remote correspondance.

Token.Abstract: Creates and returns an NSRRequest object set to remotely update a given object.

Parameter.Name: obj
Parameter.Abstract: Object you wish to update.

ReturnValue.Abstract: An NSRRequest object set to remotely update a given object.

Token.Abstract: Creates and returns an NSRRequest object set to remotely "put" (replace) a given object.

Parameter.Name: obj
Parameter.Abstract: Object you wish to update.

ReturnValue.Abstract: An NSRRequest object set to remotely "put" (replace) a given object.

Token.Abstract: Routes the request to the given string.

Parameter.Name: route
Parameter.Abstract: The route.

Token.Abstract: Routes the request to a given class's controller.

Parameter.Name: class
Parameter.Abstract: Class to which to route. Must be an NSRRemoteObject subclass.

Token.Abstract: Routes the request to a given object.

Parameter.Name: object
Parameter.Abstract: Object to route to. If this object's remoteID is nil, will only route to its class.

Token.Abstract: Routes the request to a given class's controller.

Parameter.Name: class
Parameter.Abstract: Class to route to. Must be an NSRRemoteObject subclass.

Parameter.Name: customMethod
Parameter.Abstract: Custom method to be appended to the class's controller RESTfully (can be nil.)

Token.Abstract: Routes the request to a given object.

Parameter.Name: object
Parameter.Abstract: Object to route to. If this object's remoteID is nil, will only route to its class.

Parameter.Name: customMethod
Parameter.Abstract: Custom method to be appended RESTfully (can be nil.)

ReturnValue.Abstract: The request itself. Done to allow concise constructions (see above.

Token.Abstract: Sets the body to a given object.

Parameter.Name: object
Parameter.Abstract: Object to use as a body to send the request.

Token.Abstract: Sends the request synchronously.

Parameter.Name: error
Parameter.Abstract: Out parameter used if an error occurs while processing the request. May be NULL.

ReturnValue.Abstract: JSON response object (could be an NSArray or NSDictionary).

Token.Abstract: Sends the request asynchronously.

Parameter.Name: completionBlock
Parameter.Abstract: Block to be executed when the request is complete.
